Formulaires

label

  <label for="" class="c-form-label">Label</label>

Input

<input id="" class="c-form-input" type="text" placeholder="placeholder">

Textarea

<textarea class="c-form-textarea" name="" id=""></textarea>

Select

<select class="c-form-select" name="" id="">
  <option value="">Option 01</option>
  <option value="">Option 02</option>
  <option value="">Option 03</option>
  <option value="">Option 04</option>
</select>

Radio

in progress

<div class="c-form-radio">
  <input name="radio" class="c-form-radio__input" type="radio" id="radio_1">
  <label class="c-form-radio__label" for="radio_1">Radio label</label>
</div>
<div class="c-form-radio">
  <input name="radio" class="c-form-radio__input" type="radio" id="radio_2">
  <label class="c-form-radio__label" for="radio_2">Radio label</label>
</div>
<div class="c-form-radio">
  <input name="radio" class="c-form-radio__input" type="radio" id="radio_3" disabled="disabled">
  <label class="c-form-radio__label" for="radio_3">Radio label disabled</label>
</div>

Checkbox

</div>
<div class="c-form-checkbox">

</div>
<div class="c-form-checkbox">

  <label class="c-form-checkbox__label" for="checkbox_3">Checkbox label</label>
</div>

Form field

<form class="c-form">
  <div class="c-form__field c-form__field--required">
    <label for="email" class="c-form-label">Email <small class="c-required">requis</small></label>
    <input id="email" class="c-form-input" type="email" placeholder="Exemple : duke@nukem.com">
  </div>
</form>
